document_data.mainbody:
Fishers Wharf was a pier used by fishing vessels and an occasional live-in boat tied to the docks, located in the city of Baldurs Gate.
Fishers Wharf stood on the coastal border of the Eastway section of the Lower City in Baldurs Gate. Sailors Crossing was located just a street away to the south, and Jopalins tea and kaeth cafe was built on the outer side of the block that faced Fishers Wharf.
First thing in the morning, all fishing vessels departed the pier, leaving behind docked houseboats of those who lived on the water.
In the summer of the , on Kythorn 19, the Sailors Crossing plaza became a scene of a grizzly murder. The nearby Fishers Wharf had one witness â€“ the aging alchemist named Drusilla. She lives in a distinctly decorated docked boat. The investigator named Tav was familiar with the alchemist and discussed what she heard during the murder over a cup of tea.
